title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a scorpion sting by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Scorpion sting dream interpretationDreams that carry a variety of interpretations between negative and positive and depend largely on the psychological and social situation of the individual in his real life. In general, scholars interpret the dream as an indication of exposure to sadness and persecution.Scorpion sting dream interpretationA dream that a scorpion stings in a dream indicates exposure to injustice. From the people around him, in addition to entering a difficult period in which the dreamer suffers from many conflicts in his personal and professional life. A scorpion sting in a dream and the lack of pain is an indication of the money that the person will obtain in the near future and will greatly help him improve his material and social life, as he becomes one of the owners of... Successful projects. Dreaming about a scorpion sting on the back is a sign of falling into a big problem from which one cannot escape without losing valuable things, while a scorpion sting in the eye is a sign of hatred and envy from those close to it. Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion sting by Ibn Sirin. A scorpion sting in a dream could be a sign On the profits that a person will achieve without effort, but they end in a short time. The dream also indicates the presence of many hateful people who carry hatred and envy in their hearts. Towards the dreamer. Being stung by a scorpion in a dream is an indication of the trials and difficulties that a person is going through in his current life, but he is patient and flexible and can face his misfortunes with courage and strength. While a scorpion sting on the hand is a sign of a large, irreparable material loss and the accumulation of many From debts to the dreamer. Watching a yellow scorpion sting in a dream indicates bad luck and loss of comfort and happiness in life, as a person suffers from many worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream of a scorpion sting for a single woman. Dreaming of a scorpion sting in a girl’s dream is evidence that there is a person in her life who is trying to harm her. Many problems that you find very difficult to escape safely from, and the dream may express material and moral loss. Which an unmarried woman is exposed to. The presence of a scorpion in the bed of an unmarried girl and the sting is a sign of bad friends who push her to follow forbidden paths, in addition to many problems and troubles that the dreamer goes through and that puts her in a state of constant sadness and anxiety. The scorpion sting in the left hand of an unmarried girl A married woman is a sign of great material damage that cannot be compensated, in addition to her suffering from many accumulated debts and entering a state of poverty and extreme distress. Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion sting for a married woman Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion sting in a woman’s dream is an unpleasant vision that expresses many problems and disagreements that It happens in her married life and leaves her in a state of constant sadness and unhappiness as a result of her failure to do so. Reaching a state of understanding and stability with her husband. A scorpion sting in the left hand of a married woman is evidence of evil people who seek to ruin her life and want to cause problems and crises between the dreamer and her husband until her marital relationship ends and she becomes lonely and miserable. A scorpion stings the dreamer’s husband in a dream, which is an indication

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a goat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying a goat in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about buying a goat in a dreamInterpretation of dreams: To buy a goat in a dream could be a sign of good things, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself buying a goat, it may be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself buying a goat in a dream, This may represent goodness and benefit, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees in a dream that she is buying a goat, this may lead to good news, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream that I bought a Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I buy the Qur’an in a dream could be a sign of goodness and increased knowledge, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself buying a copy of the Qur’an, this may indicate justice, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married man buying a copy of the Qur’an in a dream, it may express a good condition, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself buying a copy of the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate his kindness and provision, and God knows best. I know. Interpretation of a dream about buying makeup in a dream. title: Interpretation of seeing a garden in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a garden in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing a garden in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in interpreting the garden in a dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. In a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing Paradise in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing a garden in a dream means a man who preserves himself and protects himself from desires, and an honorable woman with chastity. Seeing a garden in a dream is It indicates many good deeds that the dreamer does for the sake of God without anyone knowing. Seeing a dead person in a garden in a dream indicates that the deceased was a good person and did many good things in his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a giraffe in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing A garden in a dream for Al-Nabulsi? Seeing a garden in a dream indicates that the dreamer is devoted religiously and is always present in places of worship such as mosques and dhikr circles. Seeing a garden in a dream also indicates a woman who has a lot of property and a lot of money. What is the interpretation of seeing a garden in a dream for a single woman? An unmarried woman in a garden in a dream. This indicates that she will soon marry a kind and kind person and live with him a life full of happiness and stability. See also: Interpretation of seeing flowers in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a garden in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman walking in a garden in a dream shows that she is living a life A marriage full of peace and happiness. Seeing a married woman in a garden in a dream announces that her children in the future will be good and fair to her and their father. See also: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a garden in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman in a beautiful garden in a dream says that she will engage in an easy job. And free of pain, and she and her fetus will enjoy good health after the operation. Interpretation of a dream about green land: Seeing green land in a dream indicates that the next period of the dreamer’s life will occur when something enjoyable that has been wanted to happen for a long time happens. To see yourself sitting on green land in a dream shows that The dreamer will soon be romantically linked with someone who suits him and they will be happy. See also: Interpretation of seeing a green salad in a dream Interpretation of seeing beautiful landscapes for single people Seeing a single woman seeing beautiful landscapes in a dream announces that she will live the next period of her life with peace of mind and peace of mind without worries and problems. Seeing a single woman landscapes Beautiful nature in a dream announces very good and widespread food for him in the next few days. Interpretation of seeing a home garden in a dream. Seeing a garden in the house in a dream indicates the marriage of two people from the same family. Seeing a garden in the home in a dream also indicates living in luxury, bliss and bliss. Seeing a garden In the house in a dream, it may indicate that the people of this house will get...

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about light rain according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about light rain in a dream. Many interpretation scholars have tried to explain the dream of light rain in a dream. Rain is a source of goodness in reality, and its descent is one of the times when prayers are answered, which is what we know today. What is the interpretation of a dream about light rain? Light rain in a dream expresses It expresses a major difference in the dreamer’s life from what it was before, so it will turn from distress to prosperity (God willing). Leading dream interpretation scholars, including Ibn Shaheen, said that light rain expresses a major breakthrough in the dreamer’s life, especially if the previous period has passed. With many failures and full of worries and sorrows, until it reached a great extent. The stage of anguish and pain that is difficult to bear, but with his patience and satisfaction with God’s judgment, relief approaches (God willing). The fortuneteller’s previous suffering will end soon. If the dispute is between the partner, stability will be their ally in the future. If you are worried and have endured a lot in your life, but you have taken refuge. To pray to your Lord to remove your worries and forgive you for the sins you have committed, as these worries may be a result of them, so light rain is good. News that your prayers will be answered, that sorrows will be far from you, and that there is a lot of happiness on its way to you. The dreamer who is on the path to achieving his goals, whether related to education, success at work, or obtaining money through legal means, will achieve what he aspires to after making the necessary effort. Therefore, the interpretation of seeing light rain indicates the psychological calm, comfort and confidence that a person feels in his life after going through many disturbances and tensions in the past. Seeing light rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that rain is a source of life for creatures, plants and animals, and it ultimately feeds on A person sees them falling gently and does not explode or panic, as happens when it rains heavily until it reaches the point of torrents in which it falls. It is the punishment of the sinner, and the status indicates goodness and prosperity in the future of the dreamer. The interpretation of the dream of light rain by Ibn Sirin is that the dreamer may have tried to pray to God with a specific desire and the vision came to him as evidence of the fulfillment of his desire and that the coming days will bring him many surprises that will satisfy his heart. If the town or The village in which the dreamer lives has been subjected to an unjust ruler, and has been tyrannized and forced to excess, until the calls of the oppressed rise up to the oppressor, then light rain means the end of that tyrant. And the spread of justice in the country. When the water falling from the sky is not followed by winds or other natural phenomena, this means calm and stability in the dreamer’s condition, and that the time of calm has come after the anxiety he has experienced for a long time. What is the interpretation of a dream of light rain for a single woman? A dream of rain Al-Khafif for single people: If a girl was going through a psychological crisis and faced many worries and endured the problems that arose between family members, until she found herself in a tense atmosphere that affected her greatly, but she realized that there was no refuge from God except Him. She was interested in establishing her relationship with the Lord Almighty. Now that he saw this

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person dying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person dying in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. This is for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man, a young man, and a divorced woman. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream? Seeing a dead person dying in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and crying intensely over him is a sign that the dreamer will soon marry someone close to him. You dream of crying because of the death of someone you love in The dream indicates the approaching Gulf and the death of worry and sadness. Seeing the death of a dead person in a dream is again a sign of the fortuneteller losing someone he loves. Seeing death in a dream by Ibn Sirin and shouting at him loudly are bad visions that indicate the loss of all his money and bring him evil and evil. See also: Interpretation of a vision A silent dead person in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person dying again in a dream? Seeing a dead person dying again in a dream without crying over it is a sign of the arrival of joy and happy days in the dreamer’s life. Dreaming about crying over a dead person is a sign of easing matters, removing anxiety, stabilizing life, or recovering. Seeing a dead person dying again in the same place of his death is a sign that opens many doors of livelihood for the dreamer and blessings in his life. Seeing a dead person dying in a dream is an indication of many positive changes in the dreamer’s life and change for the better. See also: Interpretation of seeing an orange tree in a dream. Is the interpretation of a single person seeing a dead person in a dream? Seeing a single girl dying in a dream indicates changes in her life, such as approaching marriage or starting a new life with a good man. A single girl seeing the death of someone she knows in a bad way shows that she has been exposed to major disasters and misfortunes in her life that will bring her Sadness and sorrow. A single woman seeing a dead man again during her sleep is a sign that she is constantly thinking about many things and trying to get rid of her problems. Seeing a single girl crying fervently over a dead person she knows indicates high morals for her fiancé and enjoying a good reputation. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lemon tree in a dreamWhat Interpretation of a married woman seeing a dead person in a dream? A married woman seeing the death of a dead person in a dream is an indication of the many pressures exerted on her and her many responsibilities, which affect her psychology and destroy her life. A married woman saw in a dream the death of a dear person, an indication that she bears many burdens at home and is trying to fulfill her roles in the best way possible. Completely and without neglecting her family, with the stability of her life, her husband’s love for her, and the beginning of a prosperous life full of joy and delight. Love. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lemon tree in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a person dying in a dream? Seeing a dying man in a dream, the significance of his relationship with a girl who is a relative of this deceased, and the strength of the relationship between them. Dreaming of crying over a dead person without a loud sound, symbolizes the solution of the dreamers’ problems, the stability of their lives, and the joy of their entry into the world. Their homes. A sick person seeing the death of one of his relatives. Crying a lot for him is a sign of good health and recovery from illness. Seeing a dying person in a dream indicates the death of a slave of the deceased’s relatives and harming his family with evil. See also: Interpretation of seeing socks in a dream. Love. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lemon tree in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a person die in a dream? Seeing a dying man in a dream indicates his relationship with a girl from the relatives of this deceased and the strength of the relationship between them. Dreaming of crying over a dead person without a loud voice, symbolizes the solution of the dreamers' problems and the stability of their lives and the joy of entering their homes. Seeing a sick person of the death of one of his relatives Crying a lot over him is a sign of good health and recovery from illness. Seeing a dying person in a dream It indicates the death of a servant from the relatives of the deceased and harming his family with evil. See also: Interpretation of seeing socks in a dream You can write your dream through

title: Interpretation of the death of a dead person in a dream in different situations

preview.html: Dear reader, we present to you in this article the interpretation of the death of a dead person in a dream. It is one of the strange dreams because a person dies only once, and after that he remains lying underground until the Day of Resurrection. . But some may dream of seeing their dead relatives dying again in their dreams, so what does the interpretation of these dreams symbolize? This is what we will learn through the following lines in this article from the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of the death of a dead person in a dream. The meaning of the death of a dead person again in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that a dead person died a terrible death in a dream, then this dream symbolizes the occurrence of a disaster in the place where he saw death. If a person sees in a dream that a dead person tells him that he is not dead, then it is fortunate that God Almighty has accepted that dead person as a witness, because they are alive and their Lord is feeding him. Among the promising visions of seeing a dead person in a dream is for the dreamer to see that the deceased dies in his dream and that his relatives bid him farewell. Without tears or sadness, this vision portends the marriage of one of his children or grandchildren. Thus, on the contrary, seeing the deceased dying and his family bidding him farewell with crying, wailing, sadness, screaming, and other manifestations of intense sadness indicates that one of the deceased’s grandchildren will get sick or die and his family will be deeply distressed. Sad about his separation. And when a man sees in a dream that his son has died, he should not be upset, because this vision is good and means that he will get rid of his enemies, but the evil in this dream is seeing his daughter dead. This vision suggests that anxiety will find him. It is also an unpleasant vision for a person to see the deceased dying while sleeping naked on the floor, then this dream means that the dreamer will be affected by poverty. On the contrary, if he sees in a dream that the deceased is dying on a bed or in A high place, this is good news that he will reach a high position among the people and his status and fame will rise among the will. Spread. Whoever saw that a dead person had died and people continued their normal lives, and there was no one beside him, or at his funeral there were no signs of death, this vision symbolizes that the dreamer’s house will be damaged, and he will repair this damage. Washing the dead in a dream To dream that you are washing The dead in a dream are among the most promising visions, and their interpretation varies depending on the dreamer’s condition. Whoever is sick and sees in his dream that he is washing the dead, this vision foretells to the dreamer that he will recover from his illness in the near future, and God Almighty will bless him with health and well-being. Whoever sees in his dream that he is washing a dead relative This vision symbolizes that the good deeds performed by the people of that dead person have received their reward from God Almighty, and it was said: seeing the dead person washing him. Many blessings for the dreamer and for the dead. Whoever sees a dead person washing in a dream, this is good news for the dreamer that God Almighty will relieve him of his distress and remove his worries. Seeing a dead person asking a person to wash his clothes, this vision indicates that the dead person needs something from his relatives who know that he is connected to him through People's rights, such as executing a will made before him. . Death, or spending on him, as this may indicate the dead person’s need for good deeds such as charity and begging. To interpret another dream, you can use the Live D application

title: Interpretation of a father’s death in a dream. A father’s death in a dream

preview.html: A dream about the death of a father, for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man, the death of a living or deceased father, the death of the father and crying over him and seeing him dead. The father of Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. The death of the father in a dream and that the death of the father in public life represents a great difficulty for children, which It may cause a very bad psychological state that continues for some time to forget the anniversary of the father’s death. It is the nerve of life, but when you see it in a dream, it carries great and important signs for the dreamer. The person must be fully aware of it, and this is what we will show you. The great interpreter Ibn Sirin, the interpreter of dreams, explained to us in his books and some interpretations of the death of a father in a dream that it has many important meanings that differ. From one person to another. Interpretation of the death of a father in a dream: Whoever dreams of the death of his mother or father, this means that he will restore trust to someone, and it is also said that it indicates longevity. Whoever dreams of the death of his father, this indicates the return of trust to someone, and it is also said that it indicates To long life. If one sees his father in a dream and the person is worried or hoping for help, this is an indication that his relatives may offer him a helping hand and we suggest that he be patient until he sees that. Watching the death of the father in a dream indicates that the person will go through a period Of anguish, difficulties, and danger, but he will go through a number of stages. If one sees in his dream that his father is sick, this likely indicates his illness. Perhaps this indicates that his condition will get worse. If the father is digging in the ground in a dream, perhaps this indicates the father’s grave or the dreamer’s grave. It is possible The interpretation is that the person will face some sorrows, hardships, and problems. Watching the death of a father in a dream, while he is already alive, indicates longevity. The death of a father in a dream can indicate a state of frustration, failure, and loneliness. Seeing the death of a father in a dream can indicate In some cases to separation from the family, either through divorce or death. The model of the death of a father relates to the situation in which the fortuneteller outgrows his relationship with his father, as well as the health condition of the father. In general, the death of a father in a dream often indicates a transformation occurring in the life of the dreamer, and this The transformation, whatever it may be, and at that moment, is radical. The death of the living indicates a person’s response to his trust or longevity. The death of the living indicates a deficiency in the matters of prayer, that is, the combination of duties, that is, a lack of focus due to many preoccupations. The death of the living and consolation heralds something beautiful, according to the Almighty’s saying (And give glad tidings to The Patient. Interpretation of the father’s death in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the father’s death in a dream is evidence of the protection of Almighty God and complete reconciliation of the individual. Seeing the father’s death in a dream is evidence that the person will go through a state of despair that will soon end. Seeing the father’s death in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s illness. Or that his life will change from better to worse. Seeing the death of a young child’s father is evidence that his father will give him a lot. Seeing the death of a father in a dream is evidence of getting rid of problems and worries, but with the help of relatives and friends, and escaping from harm.

title: Interpretation of seeing a raging white horse and its meaning in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a raging white horse and its meaning in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the horse is one of the noble and powerful animals that the Arabs have known since ancient times due to their love and care for it. Their daily life situations, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a raging white horse, and its meaning in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a raging white horse in a dream: The horse in a dream symbolizes your inner self and your true personality and always expresses your strength and self-esteem. Especially How ambitious are you in life and what are your dreams, so if you see in your dream that you are following a raging horse. And it was white and you were happy and you were not afraid of that horse, it means that you are a person with a lot of high ambitions. A raging and free horse means that these dreams will come true and that all What you want in life will be what you want. But if your dream is that you are afraid of a horse when it rages and you try to escape from it, it means that you are a person who does not want to take responsibility. And you are constantly running away from it, so you are a person who loves freedom but you exaggerate this feeling. It can make you You lose a lot of things that you will not realize their true value until after you lose them. As for the interpretation of the dream of a raging white horse attacking you and wounding you, this is its meaning. The ambitions and dreams that you seek to achieve will be the reason for your downfall in life. The horse and the state of excitement in the dream indicate that your ambitions are very large and unruly. And that you are afraid of the horse and you are trying to escape. This means that you do not deserve to reach or achieve these dreams, but you are determined to reach them. But your horse attacks you and you get hurt, this means that the determination that you have will be the sure way to destroy your life. Therefore, this dream could be a message It attracts a lot of attention and makes you re-arrange the priorities of your life. For a person to have dreams and aspirations that he strives for, but these things must be compatible with his life and his abilities. This person has a real mind that is better than an imaginary mind that puts reality aside. As for the interpretation of a dream about a raging white horse In chains and want to get rid of it. This means that you are a free person who loves adventure and wants to rebel against reality, but there are many things that prevent you from doing so. It can also indicate that you are creative inside but are afraid to let go of it. But there are restrictions and fears that you place on yourself It does not make you realize your true potential. This dream means that deep down you want to bring out these abilities, but you also cannot overcome the fears you have placed on yourself. That is why you must realize that those who are not creative today will not be there tomorrow because we are in an age where we only love Creative people. Interpretation of a dream when I see a horse attacking me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams. A horse attacking me in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face a major crisis in his work or life. It may also mean that the crisis that you will face will be caused by a friend or family member. He is the one who wants to harm you and therefore It is necessary to know that the horse in this vision means that you trust one of your relatives or friend and it shows you the opposite

title: Interpretation of an octopus in a dream for a single girl

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an octopus in one dream: An octopus in a single woman’s dream shows her superior abilities and multiple skills, and symbolizes her tendencies and whims at times, and the good nature of seeing a girl in her dream as if she is playing with an octopus. This interpretation applies only to the white octopus, while the black octopus symbolizes dangers and perhaps intrigues and hatred. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing an octopus in a dream as evidence of the dreamer’s strength and determination. Interpretation of seeing an octopus in a dream Seeing an octopus in a dream can indicate problems or difficulties that he may face The viewer in the future if the viewer sees that he confronts him or sees him violently. Seeing an octopus in a woman’s dream indicates multiple abilities and high abilities, and it also indicates that this woman is inclined to her personal desires and whims, and if she sees that she is playing with an octopus, this is good news. In her life, and if she sees a white octopus, this is a sign of the person with whom the girl will communicate and who wants to please her a lot. As for seeing a black octopus in a dream, this indicates grudges, problems, and difficulties. Seeing an octopus in a married woman’s dream shows the tension of the family bond, and if she sees That she catches, cooks, or eats octopus in her home is a sign of abundance because the octopus lives in the water. An octopus in a married woman’s dream is similar to the interpretation of seeing fish or mollusks in a dream, and all of these visions symbolize prosperity, nourishment, and comfort. If a pregnant woman sees an octopus in her dream, this means good news and ease of pregnancy and childbirth, because the octopus has eight legs and the number eight indicates the passing of pain and suffering. And the patient recovered. In terms of colours, it indicates the approaching date of birth and may indicate that the birth will be normal, and if a pregnant woman sees that she is eating an octopus, this is good news for abundant nutrition and kindness. As for seeing an octopus in a man’s dream, it indicates the strength of his determination and will, and if the octopus is white Color shows kindness and determination in the viewer. It is good news for the imminent appearance of great things or good events related to food and a lot of money, and if a man sees his wife buying an octopus, this is evidence of many children or money in the coming days, God willing. Seeing a large octopus in a dream indicates a lot of goodness, money and food. Whoever sees in a dream that he is killing an octopus, this is a sign that he is overcoming troubles and difficulties in his life, and whoever sees that an octopus is attacking him and trying to catch him, this indicates that there are many problems and difficulties in the dreamer’s life. Anyone who dreams that he is playing with an octopus means that he is living Interesting adventures. It may indicate that the dreamer is going through many difficult experiences and that he will overcome these experiences with many benefits and obtain relevant experiences in trade and money.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing makeup in a dream Makeup is one of the cosmetic tools in every girl's bag and home, as it has become one of the most important tools that a girl cannot do, and we will cover it in this next article. Interpretation of a dream about makeup by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees in his dream that he is putting on cosmetics, this indicates that this person is not satisfied with himself. He always tries to change the problem and define his image in front of others. If a person is seen using a lot of makeup, this indicates that this person is trying to hide his true face from people in order to deceive him. Interpretation of buying makeup in a dream for a single woman has many connotations and symbols that can be traced in detail through the following lines. Makeup is considered one of the most important cosmetic tools for girls and women in general, as it is one of the cosmetic equipment consisting of lipstick and powder. Scientists believe that the idea of ​​​​makeup is basically a bad idea, because makeup means hiding your flaws and appearing in a way that contradicts the truth. Interpretation of seeing makeup for a single woman in a dream Seeing a girl in a dream that she is buying makeup and cosmetics is an indication of the self-confidence she feels. Seeing a girl's makeup box in a dream is evidence of the comfort and happiness she lives. If a girl sees in her dream that she is wearing makeup, this It indicates the praise you give to others. If you see that the girl is wearing a bad look of makeup, this indicates the failure of her relationship with others. Putting on eyeliner in a dream is a sign of goodness and money. Seeing a girl standing in front of the mirror and decorating eyeliner, this indicates the good work of this girl and brings her closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing makeup for a married woman in a dream Makeup in a woman's dream indicates marital stability and happiness. If the makeup is excessive. This may indicate exaggeration and exaggeration in the affairs of her life and may indicate the presence of a hidden secret from her husband. If she feels sad while putting on makeup, this may indicate that her husband is married to someone else or wants to marry someone else. And because you see a married woman in her sleep, when she puts on makeup she feels upset, and when she removes it she feels psychological comfort. In this warning to the woman that beauty is not the beauty of the face but her beauty. The soul is the sweetness of faith. Interpretation of seeing makeup for a divorced woman in a dream The dream of makeup in a dream indicates a radical change in her life and pleasant surprises on the way. If a divorced woman sees herself in a dream wearing makeup and is not satisfied, this indicates that she will marry a bad man. As for her makeup in front of her ex-lover, this indicates her response to him again. And if she sees that she is wearing makeup to adorn herself and look beautiful and attractive, this reflects many livelihoods. Interpretation of seeing makeup for a pregnant woman in a dream Dream law scholars say that seeing makeup in a pregnant woman's dream indicates that she is very worried about changing her appearance and changing her situation due to pregnancy. If she sees that her face is yellow and tries to put on makeup to hide signs of fatigue, this indicates that she will suffer from problems

When she puts on makeup, she feels uncomfortable, and when she removes it, she feels psychologically comfortable. In this warning to the woman, beauty is not the beauty of the face, but rather her beauty. The soul is the sweetness of faith. Interpretation of seeing makeup for a divorced woman in a dream: Dreaming of makeup in a dream indicates a radical change in her life and pleasant surprises on the way. If a divorced woman sees herself in a dream wearing makeup and is not satisfied, this indicates that she will marry a bad man. As for Her makeup in front of her ex-lover, this indicates her response to him again. And if she sees that she is wearing makeup to adorn herself and look beautiful and attractive, this reflects many livelihoods. Interpretation of seeing makeup for a pregnant woman in a dream Dream law scholars say that seeing makeup in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates She is very concerned about changing her appearance and changing her situation due to pregnancy. If she sees that her face is yellow and she tries to wear makeup to hide signs of fatigue, this indicates that she will suffer from troubles.
